methodology.title: Methodology
methodology.description: OVHcloud uses Life Cycle Analysis (LCA) to quantify greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions generated throughout the lifecycle of cloud services, from design to end of service. Our approach is certified compliant with the Bilan Carbone® method and the GHG Protocol.

info.title: OVHcloud environmental commitment
info.description: OVHcloud is committed to a sustainable cloud through water cooling, component reuse, and energy optimization of its datacenters. Our average global PUE is 1.28, well below the industry average.
